front.title: Performance Measurement (PM) with Alternate Marking in Network Virtualization Overlays (NVO3)

abstract.t: This document describes how the alternate marking method can be used for performance measurement method in a Network Virtualization Overlays (NVO3) Domain. The description aims to be general for NVO3 encapsulations, but is focused to Geneve, recommended by the NVO3 design team [I-D.ietf-nvo3-encap].
